team15

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • team15.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User object provides an api to interact with the underlying weather application. Users are identified by a unique name to be provided when initialized. Each user's preferences and location are stored between program runs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String userName)
      Main constructor for the user class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String userName)
        Main constructor for the user class. A unique user name is to be provided (need to implement).
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the current user's name.
        Returns:
        A string containing the user's name

      • getLocationList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Location> getLocationList()
        Returns the user's list of locations as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the user's locations

      • setCurrentLoc

        public void setCurrentLoc(Location loc)
        Set the current user's preferred location.
        Parameters:
        loc - A location object that specifies the user's new preferred location

      • getCurrentLocation

        public Location getCurrentLocation()
        Returns the users preferred location.
        Returns:
        A location object that represents the user's current preferred location

      • addLocation

        public void addLocation(java.lang.String location)
        Add a new location to the list of user's locations. If the user does not have a current location, the new location added will be set as the user's current preferred location. The string should contain at least a city and country, but may also contain a province/state.
        Parameters:
        location - A string specifying the user's location

      • removeLocation

        public void removeLocation(Location loc)
        Allows the user to remove a specified location from their list.
        Parameters:
        loc - A location object that specifies the location to remove

      • getCurrentWeather

        public Weather getCurrentWeather()
        Returns a single weather object that contains the most recent weather information for the user's current preferred location. The method also converts the weather's temperature to celsius.
        Returns:
        A weather object with the most recent weather data for the current location

      • getShortTermWeather

        public java.util.ArrayList<Weather> getShortTermWeather(int num)
        Returns an ArrayList of Weather objects. The number of Weather objects returned need to be specified. The temperature is converted from kelvin to celsius.
        Parameters:
        num - Number of Weather objects, in 3 hours increment to be returned.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Weather objects.
